_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The principle for depleting all fuel [sn: The impermanence of the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact
The impermanence of the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact
The things a learned noble disciple grow: The eye, sights, eye consciousness, and eye contact
The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact
The ear, nose, tongue, and body
The mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind contact
The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact
